project.description:
This build will:
1) Fetch the HEAD of the master branch of each selected repository from the specified github organization
2) Push each fetched branch to the master branch of the corresponding bu-ist github organization The push should be fast-forward.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: FETCH_ORG
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The url for the github organization where content will be fetched from

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: FETCH_USER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The user who has access for fetching.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PUSH_ORG
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The url for the organization where content will be pushed to

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PUSH_USER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The user who has access for pushing

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
counter=0 repos=()
if $KC ; then repos=("${repos[@]}" "kc"); fi if $KC_RICE ; then repos=("${repos[@]}" "kc-rice"); fi
if [ ${#repos[@]} == 0 ] ; then echo "NO REPOSITORIES SELECTED! NOTHING TO DO." exit 1 else echo "Selected repositories: ${repos[@]}" fi
if [ -z "$FETCH_ORG" ] ; then echo "FETCH_ORG not set. Aborting" exit 1 fi
if [ -z "$PUSH_ORG" ] ; then echo "PUSH_ORG not set. Aborting" exit 1 fi
if [ -z "$FETCH_USER" ] ; then echo "FETCH_USER not set. Aborting" exit 1 fi
if [ -z "$FETCH_PASSWORD" ] ; then echo "FETCH_PASSWORD not set. Aborting" exit 1 fi
if [ -z "$PUSH_USER" ] ; then echo "PUSH_USER not set. Aborting" exit 1 fi
if [ -z "$PUSH_PASSWORD" ] ; then echo "PUSH_PASSWORD not set. Aborting" exit 1 fi
# Escape all "@" characters in the password fields FETCH_PWD=$(echo $FETCH_PASSWORD | sed s/@/%40/g) PUSH_PWD=$(echo $PUSH_PASSWORD | sed s/@/%40/g)
cd /tmp
for repo in "${repos[@]}"; do if $KC_API ; then FETCH_REPO=https://${FETCH_USER}:${FETCH_PWD}@github.com/${FETCH_ORG}/${repo}.git if [ ! -d kc-api ] ; then git clone -b master --single-branch $FETCH_REPO cd kc-api else cd kc-api git fetch --tags $FETCH_REPO master fi
PUSH_REPO=https://${PUSH_USER}:${PUSH_PWD}@github.com/${PUSH_ORG}/${repo}.git git push --tags $PUSH_REPO master
counter=$((counter+1)) fi done
